name: Spell Mania: Spelling Games
description:
-- Spell Mania --

Swipe over the letter tiles to spell as many words as you can.
Discover 3, 4, 5, 6 & 7-letter words.

3 game modes:

-- Free Play --

Untimed gameplay! Play at your own pace.
Find as many words as you can!

Need help? Use Clues to discover longer words.
Improve your score to unlock more clues!

-- Puzzle Mode --

Tap any word in the list to get a clue!
Try to find all the valid words and solve the puzzle.

-- Time Attack --

Find as many words as you can before the time runs out!

Improve your score to increase your game time.
Beat your high score and compete on the Game Center leaderboard.

Features:

+ Dictionary : once you spell a word you can check its definition & thesaurus.
Check the definitions for all the valid words at the end of each game.
+ Universal app
+ GameCenter: compete on 2 leaderboards and try to earn 15 achievements
+ iCloud Sync: sync your game progress across multiple devices

Are you left-handed? Playing on iPad? You can flip the game screen for a better experience.
